{{Location Intro|description=<p>Dar al-Shifa, now abandoned, used to be a hospital that specialized in treating patients with [[Eleazar]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Cry From the Eleazar Hospital}}</ref> Old [[Eleazar Hospital Notes|hospital notes]] found at the site also suggest that [[Dottore|one doctor]] was using the patients as test subjects for dangerous experimental treatments.</p>}}

During the {{Quest|Cry From the Eleazar Hospital}}, the [[Traveler]], [[Paimon]], and [[Alhaitham]] investigate the abandoned hospital and end up finding [[Razak]].

==Trivia==
* Dar al-Shifa was named after a prayer for patients.<ref>{{Ref/VP|Lifeless Dar al-Shifa}}</ref>
* Deceased [[hilichurls]] can be found in the tunnels under Dar al-Shifa.

===Etymology===
* {{Lang|''Dar Al-Shifa''|ar=دار الشفاء}} means "house of healing" in Arabic.
